entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain or periods of drizzle ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
